thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 2 of 96
thread.title: Gerry Carter

author: Gerry Carter
title: Gerry Carter
text:
Recently, I made my first transfer and within minutes Brian rang me to help explain the process. Throughout this process, I received numerous emails stating the status of the transfer, very reassuring.
OFX has a great exchange rate and coupled with excellent service and speedy transfer, I would have no hesitation in recommending this Company.
I believe I will be using OFX for many more years to come. Well done.
